        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    // Datasource Filter And Search Source Filter AND (OR Class)
    g_scratchpad.recordCount = 0;
    var fDatasourceFilter = new sn_ais.AisUtil().getTableLevelAttribute(current.datasource.source, 'filter', '');
    var fSearchSourceFilter = current.condition;
    var fTables = [];

    fTables.push("sys_class_name=" + current.getValue("datasource"));
    var childTablesGr = new GlideRecord('ais_child_table');
    childTablesGr.addQuery("datasource", current.datasource.sys_id);
    childTablesGr.addQuery("active", "true");
    childTablesGr.query();
    while (childTablesGr.next())
        fTables.push("sys_class_name=" + childTablesGr.getValue("table"));
    var conditions = [];
    conditions.push(fDatasourceFilter);
    conditions.push(fSearchSourceFilter);
    conditions.push(fTables.join("^OR"));
    var filteredConditions = conditions.filter(Boolean);
    var condition = filteredConditions.join("^");
    var count = new GlideAggregate(current.datasource);
    count.addAggregate('COUNT');
    count.addEncodedQuery(condition, true);
    count.query();
    var records = 0;
    if (count.next()) {
        records = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
        g_scratchpad.recordCount = records;
    }
    g_scratchpad.adjustedCondition = condition;
})(current, previous);]]></script>
